'''Florian''' is the hero of a legend. According to it, he was a foolish [[knight]] who fell in love with [[Jonquil]] when he first saw her bathing with her sisters in [[Maidenpool]]. Florian and Jonquil became lovers.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/maidenpool/ HBO viewers guide entry on Maidenpool]</ref>
